channel.title: Demos on My Hugo Site with Bigspring
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on My Hugo Site with Bigspring

item.title: Video Embeds Demo
item.description: Video Embeds Demo This page demonstrates how to embed videos from different platforms. YouTube Video Here’s an example YouTube video embed: Vimeo Video Example Vimeo embed: Local Video For local video files, you can use HTML5 video tags: Your browser does not support the video tag. Responsive Video Wrapper Videos are automatically responsive and will scale to fit their container while maintaining aspect ratio.

item.title: Forms and Maps Demo
item.description: Contact Forms & Maps Integration Demo This page demonstrates various contact forms and OpenStreetMap implementations available on this Hugo site. Contact Forms Basic Contact Form Don't fill this out if you're human: Full Name * We'll use this to address you in our response. Please provide your name. Email Address * We'll respond to this email address. Please provide a valid email address. Phone Number Optional - for urgent inquiries. Company/Organization Optional - helps us understand your context.
